content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. If there is no further business to come before the 
Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand adjourned under the 
previous order.
content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL

content.text:
There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:21 p.m., adjourned until 
Wednesday, November 15, 2017, at 9:30 a.m.
content.speaker: The RECORDER
